mapper.delete: DELETE b FROM basket AS b WHERE b.basket_code = #{basketCode};
mapper.select: SELECT b.basket_code ,b.goods_code ,b.basket_group ,b.user_id ,b.goods_name ,b.category_medium_code ,cm.category_medium_name ,b.goods_price ,b.basket_amount ,b.each_payment_amount ,b.reg_date ,b.basket_state FROM basket AS b INNER JOIN category_medium AS cm ON b.category_medium_code = cm.category_medium_code WHERE b.basket_code = #{basketCode};
